statement:
Let $X=\lbrace X_t \rbrace_{t\geq 0}$ be a process satisfying the
following condition$\colon$ For all $T>0$ there exist positive constants
$\alpha$, $\beta$, $D$ such that
$$E[|X_t-X_s|^{\alpha}]\leq D|t-s|^{1+\beta} \,\,\ 0\leq s, t\leq T.$$\
Then there exists a continuous modification of $X$.
